channel.title: Click Object Verification [PI]
channel.description:
Just wondering, does anyone know how to verify click object packets so this doesn't happen? Looked around for some guides, found one but my server didn't have the java files needed.
[IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/2upzbko.jpg[/img]

item.title: Click Object Verification [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Damoiscool Damoiscool
item.description:
@Damoiscool wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:2, topic:545695”]You need to add a check server sided to make sure the object exists.
Reading the map data server sided can get you the positions of all objects in game. Use that as a check to make sure the object they clicked is actually the right one and there.[/quote]

Yeah thats what the guy doing it said, but I have no clue how to, was hoping for a little more help

Read full topic

item.title: Click Object Verification [PI]
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

You need to add a check server sided to make sure the object exists.
Reading the map data server sided can get you the positions of all objects in game. Use that as a check to make sure the object they clicked is actually the right one and there.

Read full topic
